products.title: Dartford Birch Vertical Blind
products.description: Light, bright and incredibly stylish, this dartford birch vertical blind has warm flecks to add texture and cosiness. Perfect for kitchens and bathrooms, this blind is made from hardwearing pvc. That means it's completely waterproof, while the lightweight and easy to adjust louvr light, bright and incredibly stylish, this dartford birch vertical blind has warm flecks to add texture and cosiness.

products.title: Dartford Platinum Vertical Blind
products.description: Just look at this stunning dartford platinum fabric, so stylish and modern. The light grey colour with dark little flecks looks incredibly sophisticated. This vertical blind is ideal for larger windows and offers easy light control with twisting louvres. It's also made of strong just look at this stunning dartford platinum fabric, so stylish and modern.

products.title: Dartford Warm Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: This dartford warm grey vertical blind is as contemporary as they come. In a rich and cosy tone it is ideal for a modern kitchen or bathroom. With wide sizes available and easy to twist louvres it offers incredible light control while the pvc fabric is 100% waterproof making it i this dartford warm grey vertical blind is as contemporary as they come.

products.title: Polemis Charcoal Flame Retardant Vertical Blind
products.description: This blind is just perfect for a study, an office, a classroom. Its flame retardant properties make it ideal for a professional environment. Plus, just look at that gorgeous grey tone. Nothing flashy here, just a simple, strong colour that has become incredibly stylish over th this blind is just perfect for a study, an office, a classroom.

products.title: Voile Fr Moondust Grey 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Voile fr moondust grey is a semi-translucent stylish, dark grey 127mm vertical and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen, bathroom or bedroom will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in this modern grey shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant and pollergen-coated, makes this sheer 127mm vertical blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.title: Basix Plain Flint Grey 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their basix plain range is simple and effective method of freshening up your decor. This dark grey 127mm vertical blind is a modern grey shade, made of durable fabric, and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and dark grey is an easy colour to mix and match accessories with. Part of their pollergen-coated fabrics, this blind is fantastic in high-pollen seasons as its fabric is pollen-resistant, making this a great blind for hay-fever sufferers.

products.title: Basix Blackout Shale Grey 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their basix blackout range is an easy and effective method of freshening up your decor. This medium grey 127mm vertical blind, is made of durable fabric and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and a grey blind instantly revitalises tired-looking window. Pollergen-coated, this blackout vertical blind also helps allergy sufferers with its pollen-resistant fabric, a must for high-pollen seasons.
